alert.note: Alert for Clay; Jackson; Kanawha; Putnam; Roane (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 01 at 11:16PM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Putnam, northern Kanawha, southern Roane, northwestern Clay and southeastern Jackson Counties through MIDNIGHT EST... At 1115 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Cross Lanes, or near Nitro, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Charleston, Nitro, Winfield, Jefferson, South Charleston, St. Albans, Dunbar, Hurricane, Sissonville, Eleanor, Buffalo, Clendenin, Poca, Pinch, Institute, Elkview, Cross Lanes, Wallback, Amma and Teays Valley. This includes the following highways... Interstate 79 between mile markers 1 and 38. Interstate 77 in West Virginia between mile markers 102 and 122. Interstate 64 in West Virginia between mile markers 32 and 56. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
